{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":109991,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……デート？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Date?\""},{"lineNumber":109992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":109993,"originalJapaneseLine":"フルは少し考えるように視線を宙に投げ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Furu threw his gaze into the air as if thinking for a moment,"},{"lineNumber":109994,"originalJapaneseLine":"その視線をランスに戻した。","translatedEnglishLine":"then returned his gaze to Rance."},{"lineNumber":109995,"originalJapaneseLine":"「以前から思っていたが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've thought this for a while, but...\""},{"lineNumber":109996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は女の趣味が悪いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have terrible taste in women.\""},{"lineNumber":109997,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはどこか感心しているような声色だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was said in a tone somewhat impressed."},{"lineNumber":109998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":109999,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはフルに付き合って","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance accompanied Furu"},{"lineNumber":110000,"originalJapaneseLine":"手長猿の駆除に向かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and headed out to exterminate the spider monkeys."},{"lineNumber":110001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎょっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyo!?\" (shock sound)"},{"lineNumber":110002,"originalJapaneseLine":"CITY近くの森を散歩していたランスは","translatedEnglishLine":"While Rance was taking a walk in the forest near the CITY,"},{"lineNumber":110003,"originalJapaneseLine":"驚くべきものを見つけて固まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"he found something surprising and froze."},{"lineNumber":110004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":110005,"originalJapaneseLine":"裸で佇むフルだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was Furu standing there naked."},{"lineNumber":110006,"originalJapaneseLine":"（おお……びっくりした……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Oh... that surprised me...)"},{"lineNumber":110007,"originalJapaneseLine":"（だが、これは……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(But this is...)"},{"lineNumber":110008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":110009,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うぅむ、なんとも綺麗だ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm, how beautiful...)"},{"lineNumber":110010,"originalJapaneseLine":"裸なのに不思議といやらしさはなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though naked, there was strangely no lewdness,"},{"lineNumber":110011,"originalJapaneseLine":"むしろ一枚の絵画のように美しい光景だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"rather it was a beautiful scene like a painting."},{"lineNumber":110012,"originalJapaneseLine":"（生きてた頃なら……","translatedEnglishLine":"(If she were alive..."},{"lineNumber":110013,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな感じだろうか？）","translatedEnglishLine":"would it be something like this?)"},{"lineNumber":110014,"originalJapaneseLine":"（おっ……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Oh...!)"},{"lineNumber":110015,"originalJapaneseLine":"（おーーーーっ、いいぞ、いいぞぉ！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Oooooh, nice, nice!)"},{"lineNumber":110016,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ぐふぐふぐふ……これは素晴らしい……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Heh heh heh... this is wonderful..."},{"lineNumber":110017,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うーむ、いい女だ……ぐへぐへ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"hmm, what a fine woman... hehe...)"},{"lineNumber":110018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":110019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつまでそこで見ているつもりだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How long do you intend to keep staring there?\""},{"lineNumber":110020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっと、気づいていたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oops, you noticed.\""},{"lineNumber":110021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……当然だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Of course.\""},{"lineNumber":110022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「森の中で裸の女がいたら見るだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If there's a naked woman in the forest, you'd look.\""},{"lineNumber":110023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、何をしていたんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what were you doing?\""},{"lineNumber":110024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「森林浴」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Forest bathing.\""},{"lineNumber":110025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「裸で？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Naked?\""},{"lineNumber":110026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、森林浴は裸でするに限る」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, forest bathing is best done naked.\""},{"lineNumber":110027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生前はこれが好きだったんだがな、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I liked this when I was alive,"},{"lineNumber":110028,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今となっては気分を味わうにすぎん」","translatedEnglishLine":"but now it's just to enjoy the feeling.\""},{"lineNumber":110029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":110030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":110031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":110032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いつまでいる気だ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...How long do you plan to stay?\""},{"lineNumber":110033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺とお前の仲ではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, aren’t we close friends?\""},{"lineNumber":110034,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遠慮することはないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's no need to hold back.\""},{"lineNumber":110035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あばばばーーーーーーー！？！？！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aabababa------!?!?\" (frantic outcry)"},{"lineNumber":110036,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはぴしゃーんと雷撃を落とされた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance was struck suddenly by a lightning bolt."},{"lineNumber":110037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……さて」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":110038,"originalJapaneseLine":"服を着直すとフルは","translatedEnglishLine":"After putting his clothes back on, Furu"},{"lineNumber":110039,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスを一瞥もせずに去っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"left without even glancing at Rance."},{"lineNumber":110040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さって、行こうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, shall we go?\""},{"lineNumber":110041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、ハンティ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Hanti.\""},{"lineNumber":110042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、総統閣下じゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, isn't it the Supreme Commander?\""},{"lineNumber":110043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":110044,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハンティがランスの顔をしげしげと眺める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hanti closely studied Rance's face."},{"lineNumber":110045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだぁ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":110046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、最初に会ったときは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, the first time I met you,"},{"lineNumber":110047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただの悪ガキにしか見えなかったのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you just looked like a mere brat...\""},{"lineNumber":110048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさか、世界で一番偉い男に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I never thought you'd become the most important man in the world,"},{"lineNumber":110049,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なっちゃうなんてね」","translatedEnglishLine":"but here you are.\""},{"lineNumber":110050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺様のすごさに今更気づいたか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, you've only just realized how great I am!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フルは少し考えるように視線を宙に投げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furu threw his gaze into the air as if thinking for a moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その視線をランスに戻した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then returned his gaze to Rance.
"I've thought this for a while, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはどこか感心しているような声色だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was said in a tone somewhat impressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはフルに付き合って
手長猿の駆除に向かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed out to exterminate the spider monkeys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITY近くの森を散歩していたランスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Rance was taking a walk in the forest near the CITY,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 驚くべきものを見つけて固まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he found something surprising and froze.
It was Furu standing there naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸なのに不思議といやらしさはなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though naked, there was strangely no lewdness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ一枚の絵画のように美しい光景だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rather it was a beautiful scene like a painting.
would it be something like this?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （おーーーーっ、いいぞ、いいぞぉ！）
（ぐふぐふぐふ……これは素晴らしい……
うーむ、いい女だ……ぐへぐへ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hmm, what a fine woman... hehe...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつまでそこで見ているつもりだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How long do you intend to keep staring there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「森の中で裸の女がいたら見るだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If there's a naked woman in the forest, you'd look."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、森林浴は裸でするに限る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, forest bathing is best done naked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生前はこれが好きだったんだがな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I liked this when I was alive,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今となっては気分を味わうにすぎん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now it's just to enjoy the feeling."
"...How long do you plan to stay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺とお前の仲ではないか。
遠慮することはないぞ」
ランスはぴしゃーんと雷撃を落とされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance was struck suddenly by a lightning bolt.
After putting his clothes back on, Furu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを一瞥もせずに去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: left without even glancing at Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハンティがランスの顔をしげしげと眺める。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the first time I met you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの悪ガキにしか見えなかったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you just looked like a mere brat..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、世界で一番偉い男に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought you'd become the most important man in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺様のすごさに今更気づいたか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, you've only just realized how great I am!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フルは少し考えるように視線を宙に投げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furu threw his gaze into the air as if thinking for a moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その視線をランスに戻した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then returned his gaze to Rance.
"I've thought this for a while, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはどこか感心しているような声色だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was said in a tone somewhat impressed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはフルに付き合って
手長猿の駆除に向かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and headed out to exterminate the spider monkeys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: CITY近くの森を散歩していたランスは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Rance was taking a walk in the forest near the CITY,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 驚くべきものを見つけて固まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he found something surprising and froze.
It was Furu standing there naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸なのに不思議といやらしさはなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though naked, there was strangely no lewdness,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ一枚の絵画のように美しい光景だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rather it was a beautiful scene like a painting.
would it be something like this?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （おーーーーっ、いいぞ、いいぞぉ！）
（ぐふぐふぐふ……これは素晴らしい……
うーむ、いい女だ……ぐへぐへ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hmm, what a fine woman... hehe...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつまでそこで見ているつもりだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How long do you intend to keep staring there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「森の中で裸の女がいたら見るだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If there's a naked woman in the forest, you'd look."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、森林浴は裸でするに限る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, forest bathing is best done naked."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生前はこれが好きだったんだがな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I liked this when I was alive,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今となっては気分を味わうにすぎん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now it's just to enjoy the feeling."
"...How long do you plan to stay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺とお前の仲ではないか。
遠慮することはないぞ」
ランスはぴしゃーんと雷撃を落とされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance was struck suddenly by a lightning bolt.
After putting his clothes back on, Furu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを一瞥もせずに去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: left without even glancing at Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハンティがランスの顔をしげしげと眺める。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the first time I met you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただの悪ガキにしか見えなかったのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you just looked like a mere brat..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、世界で一番偉い男に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought you'd become the most important man in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺様のすごさに今更気づいたか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, you've only just realized how great I am!"
